document.masterDocTitle: A review of the Cetoniinae (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae) from Argentina and adjacent countries: systematics and geographic distributions

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of the Cetoniinae (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae) from Argentina and adjacent countries: systematics and geographic distributions

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution:
BRAZIL
( Schenkling 1921 , Blackwelder 1944 , Krajčík 1998 ):
Amazonas
: Itamarati ( Ohaus 1909 );
Rio de Janeiro
: Rio de Janeiro ( Burmeister 1842 ); Petrópolis ( Ohaus 1900 ).

Note : Probably due to the confusion between
Gymnetis hebraica
, not Drapiez, 1820 [=
G. bajula
] and the true
G. hebraica
, this last species was not previously mentioned from Argentina . Nevertheless, the citation of
G. bajula
from Corrientes ( Schenkling 1921 ) may correspond to
G. hebraica
, which is present in this province.
